name: The Last of Waifus
description:
The Last of Waifus is a third-person shooter game in post-apocalyptic theme. You are playing as the last Waifu clearing out the fallen city from Infected whose only target is you.

Enjoy the thrill - endlessly, if you dare.. Do not expect it to ever get better, though.

Features:

  • third-person shooter
  • dynamic action gameplay
  • post-apocalyptic world

Add the game to your Wishlist and be the first one in line!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1359650/The_Last_of_Waifus/
